code: @Test public void testRoute() throws Exception {     MockEndpoint resultEndpoint = resolveMandatoryEndpoint("mock:result", MockEndpoint.class).     resultEndpoint.expectedBodiesReceived(new MyBean("foo", "bar")).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "foo:bar").     resultEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied(). }

protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:start").convertBodyTo(MyBean.class).to("mock:result").         }     }. }
